sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-form @submit.prevent="onSubmit">
    <v-expansion-panels
      focusable
      multiple>
      <AddInvestment
        @add-investment="getInvestmentData"
        v-on="$listeners" />

        <v-expansion-panel v-for="(investment,index) in investments"
                :key="investment.id"
                dense>
          <v-expansion-panel-header class="pa-3">
            <v-row class="ma-0">
            <v-col
              @click.stop
              :cols="7"
              class="py-0">
              <v-text-field
                @click.stop
                @change="addToChanged(investment)"
                :value="investment.custom_name ? investment.custom_name : investment.name.name"
                @input="doNameEdit('custom_name', index, $event, investment.id)"
                hide-details="auto"
                dense solo >
                <template
                  v-if="editName.includes(investment.id) || editAmount.includes(investment.id)"
                  v-slot:append-outer>
                    <v-icon
                      color="teal"
                      @click.stop
                      @click="updateInvestment(investment)"
                    >mdi-check-circle-outline</v-icon>
                </template>
              </v-text-field>
            </v-col>
            <v-col
              @click.stop
              :cols="3"  class="py-0">
              <v-currency-field
                @click.stop
                @change="addToChanged(investment)"
                v-model="investment.amount"
                @input.native="doAmountEdit('amount', index, $event, investment.id)"
                hide-details="auto"
                prefix="$"
                :decimal-length="0"
                dense solo />

            </v-col>
            <v-col :cols="2" class="py-0">
              <DeleteObj
                :objectType="'investment'"
                :objectToDelete="investment"
                :portfolioId="investment.portfolio"
                @delete-object="getInvestmentData"
                v-on="$listeners"
              />
              <v-btn :color="stringToColour(investment.platform_fee_group_name)">
                {{investment.platform_fee_group_name[0]}}
              </v-btn>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>

        </v-expansion-panel-header>
        <v-expansion-panel-content>
           <InvestmentDetail
             @add-investment="getInvestmentData"
             v-on="$listeners"
             :investment="investment"
             :RPAANames="RPAANames"
             :investmentClassList="investmentClassList"
           />
         </v-expansion-panel-content>
      </v-expansion-panel>
    </v-expansion-panels>
      <v-row v-if="investments.length">
        <v-col>
          <v-btn type="submit" color="primary" dark dense>Update All</v-btn>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>


  </v-form>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
import AddInvestment from "@/components/AddInvestment.vue";
import InvestmentDetail from "@/components/InvestmentDetail.vue";
import DeleteObj from "@/components/DeleteObj.vue";

export default {
  name: "InvestmentSummary",
  inject: ["platformId", "scenarioId"],
  props: {
    // Only passed as a prop so it can be watched and new investments called
    // when values changes (due to portfolio addition)
    platformTotal: {
      type: Number,
      required: true
    }
  },
  components: {
    AddInvestment,
    DeleteObj,
    InvestmentDetail
  },
  data() {
    return {
      error: null,
      investments: [],
      portfolio: {},
      RPAANames: [],
      changeList: [],
      investmentClassList: [],
      editName: [],
      editAmount: [],
      duplicate: [],
    };
  },
  watch: {
    platformTotal: function () {
      this.getInvestmentData();
    },
  },
  methods: {
    stringToColour(str) {
      let hash = 0;
      for (let i = 0; i < str.length; i++) {
        hash = str.charCodeAt(i) + ((hash << 5) - hash);
      }
      let colour = '#';
      for (let i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
        let value = (hash >> (i * 8)) & 0xFF;
        colour += ('00' + value.toString(16)).substr(-2);
      }
      return colour;
    },
    doNameEdit(field, index, event, id){
      let item = this.investments[index].custom_name;
      let original = this.duplicate.find(x => x.id === id)[field];
      if ((original == "") && (field == "custom_name")) {
        original = this.duplicate.find(x => x.id === id).name.name;
      }

      item = event;
      this.investments[index].custom_name = event;

      if (this.editName.includes(id)) {
        if (item==original) {
          const i = this.editName.findIndex(item => item.id === id);
          this.editName.splice(i,1)
        }
      } else {
        this.editName.push(id);
      }
    },
    doAmountEdit(field, index, event, id){
      let item = this.investments[index][field];
      let original = this.duplicate.find(x => x.id === id)[field];
      item = event.target.value;
      if (this.editAmount.includes(id)) {
        // v-currency-field gives the target.value as a number with commas,
        // so it must be converted to a float to compare to the original.
          if (parseFloat(item.replace(/,/g, '')) == original) {
            const i = this.editAmount.findIndex(item => item.id === id);
            this.editAmount.splice(i,1)
          }
      } else {
        this.editAmount.push(id);
      }
    },
    removeFromEdited(investment) {
      //Remove from EditAmount List
      const i = this.editAmount.findIndex(item => item.id === investment.id);
      this.editAmount.splice(i,1)
      const x = this.editName.findIndex(item => item.id === investment.id);
      this.editName.splice(x,1)
    },
    getInvestmentData() {
      let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/investments/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.investments = data.results;
        this.duplicate = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(this.investments));
      });
    },
    getInvestmentClassList() {
      let endpoint = `/api/investmentclass/`;
      apiService(endpoint, "GET").then(data => {
        this.investmentClassList = data.results;
      });
    },
    getRPNameData() {
      let endpoint = `/api/activeriskprofilenames/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.RPAANames = data.results;
      });
    },
    addInvestment(investment) {
      this.investments.unshift(investment);
      this.duplicate.unshift(...{investment});
    },
    addPortfolio(portfolio) {
      this.portfolio = portfolio;
    },
    deleteObj(objectToDelete) {
      this.$delete(this.investments, this.investments.indexOf(objectToDelete));
    },
    addToChanged(investment) {
      if (!(this.changeList.includes(investment))) {
        this.changeList.push(investment);
      } else {
        const i = this.changeList.findIndex(item => item.id === investment.id);
        this.changeList.splice(i, 1);
        this.changeList.push(investment);
      }
    },
    updateInvestment(investment) {
      let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/investments/${investment.id}/`;
      apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", {
        custom_name: investment.custom_name,
        amount: investment.amount,
      }).then(data => {
        this.$emit("add-investment", data);
        this.removeFromEdited(investment);
      });
    },
    onSubmit() {
      if (this.changeList) {
        for (let i=0; i < this.changeList.length; i++) {
          let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/investments/${this.changeList[i].id}/`;
          apiService(endpoint, "PATCH", {
            custom_name: this.changeList[i].custom_name,
            amount: this.changeList[i].amount,
          }).then(data => {
            this.getInvestmentData()
            this.$emit("add-investment", data);
          });
        };
      };
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getInvestmentData();
    this.getInvestmentClassList();
    this.getRPNameData();
  }
};
</script>
